html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00952025-02-14PPC, PSC
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectEligibility of Certain Former Members of the Canadian Forces Regulations
PrecisELIGIBILITY OF CERTAIN FORMER MEMBERS OF THE CANADIAN FORCES REGULATIONS in order to allow eligible former members of the Canadian Forces who completed their third year of service and were honourably released within the meaning of the regulations made under the National Defence Act during the period of November 13, 2020, to January 18 2024, and who had created a Public Service Resourcing System account before January 19, 2024, to participate in advertised internal appointment processes until April 1, 2029.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0025 Publication Date: 2025-02-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ELIGIBILITY OF CERTAIN FORMER MEMBERS OF THE CANADIAN FORCES REGULATIONS in order to allow eligible former members of the Canadian Forces who completed their third year of service and were honourably released within the meaning of the regulations made under the National Defence Act during the period of November 13, 2020, to January 18 2024, and who had created a Public Service Resourcing System account before January 19, 2024, to participate in advertised internal appointment processes until April 1, 2029.
